extendedInfo.description: A reimagined listening experience for KIRO Radio 97.3 FM fans. Listen to live talk shows, on-demand moments, and customized audio streams on your Android device. KIRO Radio tells you whatâs happening and why. All day we deliver the news and connect the dots through the eyes of KIROâs thinkers and talkers. Through breaking news and stories that range from the meaningful to the offbeat, we bring you whatâs most interesting right now. LISTEN - KIRO Radio News twice an hour - Your favorite KIRO Radio talk shows live and on-demand; Seattleâs Morning News with John Curley, Ross & Burbank, Dori Monson, Ron & Don, The KIRO Radio weekend shows and more. WATCH - Watch all local KIRO Radio shows live in-studio ON-DEMAND - Podcast episodes of all KIRO Radio shows - Exclusive podcasts from news and sports to food, music, gardening, and more - Create a playlist of your favorite KIRO highlights, features and interviews INTERACT - Connect with the shows live on-air - Leave an audio message for your favorite host or show

reviews.title: Good for 20 seconds
reviews.comment: UPDATE: Streams better and for longer periods than before.(added one star for this) The fact that it still doesn\'t pause when I get a phone call is ridiculous!  PREVIOUS: Constant buffering is annoying. Have to press play to restart constantly. Too bad because it looks slick and useful.
reviews.author: Jayne Lee

reviews.title: HTC one s
reviews.comment: Great app, but very cheaply done, keeps shutting down when you press home button, works for 20/30 min shuts off, I guess not well works behind the program, also no message \"sorry program was turned off not responding \" just stops...
reviews.author: Michael Grinshtat

reviews.title: Handy, but not.
reviews.comment: This app\'s features are really cool, and I\'ve tried it with both Android and iOS. It just isn\'t working right. Developer needs to fix crashing and glitches. Particularly, the past show archives don\'t work.
reviews.author: Kurtis Riley

reviews.comment: Excited to get this app BUT on demand worked then stopped. I thought at least live streaming radio is working BUT now that stopped. Won\'t play  anything now ;(
reviews.author: Louise Lasch

reviews.title: Shame
reviews.comment: No call muting. Disconnects.
reviews.author: Amir Kolsky

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: Pros:   Love listening to the weekend shows when I am walking.  The on-demand is great.  Cons: 1) It needs to mute when the phone rings.  For someone who does business on the phone this makes it almost unusable. 2) There is a volume issue.  Seems very low
reviews.author: James Duncan

reviews.title: Works but has problems
reviews.comment: Like the app, pause feature and on demand features are good.   However,  volume is too low even with volume control up to the max.   Also when you\'re on a phone call, it stays on so you hear the station on the call. Very annoying.   Galaxy s3.
reviews.author: Marky Mark

reviews.title: Volume
reviews.comment: Really need to up the volume for the app.  I have several radio apps and this is by far the lowest and unusable in most cases for me.
reviews.author: Ryan McNeil

reviews.title: Sorry for 3
reviews.comment: Everyone that knows me knows that i love kiro fm (im hotgreg from tbtl) BUT this app at times is total crap,it loves to either freeze or close.PLEASE FIX!
reviews.author: Greg Garland

reviews.title: Galaxy S III
reviews.comment: It keeps crashing on my phone.
reviews.author: Dahveed Rivera

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Solid content. Good interface. Nice player. Good stuff.
reviews.author: Dominic Zarelli

reviews.title: Good application
reviews.comment: Will not mute when call comes in. S3
reviews.author: M Berg

reviews.title: Cannot mute when phone rings
reviews.comment: I really like this app except if my phone rings I cannot pause or mute this app? So basically cannot use this. If this changes I will give 5star. Using galaxy note 2
reviews.author: Lenae D

reviews.title: No change log
reviews.comment: Rookie  move.
reviews.author: Brad Patterson

reviews.title: Great for listening anywhere!
reviews.comment: Perfect! Looking forward to having podcasts added so I can listen on demand while at the gym:)
reviews.author: Matthew Wall

reviews.title: Motorola Photon
reviews.comment: Can listen to it pretty well but the audio cuts in and out, almost like it is buffering, but constantly and sometimes it skips. Other than that good app:-)
reviews.author: Ashton Roesbery

reviews.title: Package file invalid
reviews.comment: I was stoked to download this app. Unfortunately I kept getting an error stating the \"package file invalid\

reviews.title: Very buggy it crashes every 8 mins
reviews.comment: Evo 3D ics
reviews.author: Thomas Ports

reviews.title: What\'s New?
reviews.comment: Current version works fairly well on my LG Stratosphere only \"buffering\" now and then.  So what\'s new with this update?
reviews.author: Brent Amenell

reviews.title: Too bad
reviews.comment: I was stoked to learn that KIRO radio had an app, too bad it doesn\'t work on my RAZR.
reviews.author: Jeff Pearson
